name: Basic Plan
description: Perfect for beginners who want access to essential gym equipment and facilities at an affordable price.

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for fitness enthusiasts who want group classes, better facilities, and a guided approach to health.
features: Access to gym mobile app with workout tracking
Free guest pass once a month

name: Premium Plan
description: Designed for serious athletes and committed members who want personalized training, VIP benefits, and 24/7 access.
features: Free physiotherapy consultation once a month
